Detailed Description

COPS Objects base class.

This Class provides the basic mechanisms for all COPS Objects, such as

  • Default Constructor
  • Copy Constructor
  • Available Objects enum
  • the DATA of the object

Member Function Documentation

int COPSObj::calculate_padding (  int  size  )  [protected]
 

Calculates the necessary alignment of the message in order to maintain the RFC request to align all objects to 4 bytes

Parameters:
size original size of the object
Returns:
size calculated through padding to 4 bytes

template<class Type>
struct COPSobj_data* COPSObj::FindObject (  Type  object,
unsigned int  pos
)  const throw (COPSObj_Exception) [inline, protected]
 

This function template returns a pointer to a object requested through a enum of the desired object class and it's position (default = 1)

Parameters:
object Enum of objects of Type
pos position or the order number of the desired object inside the COPSObj
Returns:
the desired COPSObj
See also:

Friends And Related Function Documentation

friend class COPSClientSI [friend]
 

It is declared friend in order to access the data of objects when dealing with Client Specific Information

COPSmessage& operator+ (  COPSmessage &  c,
const COPSObj &  obj
)  [friend]
 

Provides the means to incrementaly associate COPS Objects to a COPS message Example: 

                        COPSmessage msg;
                        COPSCommonHeader hdr;
                        COPSHandle hdl;
                        COPSContext cont;
                        msg+hdr+hdl+cont;
Parameters:
c COPSmessage to which the Objects will be appended
obj COPSObject to be appended
